item.title: todo entrypoint file
item.description: This is a set of raw pages that I want to take at look before turning them into actual bookmarks or posts dreyfus model of skill acquisition M-x Research videos GeePawHill Tweet on the State of Hiring Programmers are we really engineers? dopamine, smartphones & you: a battle for your time research as understanding distributed systems lecture notes - Dr. Martin Kleppmann Tonsky thread on things learned from other programming languages Python WSGI Michael Sugrue Lectures on philosophy stanford cs 253 web security when did computer science theory get so hard?
